techmeme.title: Officials in NC and at FEMA, responding to Hurricane Helene, face a flurry of antisemitic attacks largely on X, where some posts get tens of millions of views (Washington Post)
Filing: Shein's UK business made £1.55B in 2023 revenue, up 38% over a 16-month period to the end of 2022, as the fast fashion retailer prepares for a UK IPO (Helen Reid/Reuters)
Study: X does not act quickly to remove AI-made nonconsensual nude images reported as nonconsensual intimate media but will if reported for copyright violations (Emanuel Maiberg/404 Media)
OpenAI signs a content deal with Hearst, letting it use content from 40+ local newspapers and 20+ magazines, after deals with Condé Nast and Dotdash Meredith (Sara Fischer/Axios)
Snap says it is bringing ads to the Snapchat's main Chat tab for the first time and launches "Promoted Places" on Snap Map (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
